data.text: @haylotayloxx Hi Hayley, we apologise for the delay with your bag. Please Message us with details of your baggage file reference number, name, email address, bag tag number, and flight details. We will be able to use this information to check for an update on your bag. Thanks. https://t.co/h3SQABYbG7
